description: Clipping of psychotic and psychopath  +‎ -o (“person with characteristic”).

adjectives.description: psycho (comparative more psycho, superlative most psycho)

entries.meaning: (colloquial or derogatory) Psychotic or otherwise insane.
(derogatory, slang) A person who is psychotic or otherwise insane.
examples: The loony bin up on the hill is full of psychos.

entries.meaning: (derogatory, slang) A person who acts in a bizarre or dangerous manner.
examples: She complained that he was a psycho for driving at such a high speed in heavy traffic.
Synonyms: creep, freak, loose cannon, weirdo

entries.meaning: (informal) A class, at a college or university, in which psychology is taught.
examples: I've got anthro, socio, lunch, and psycho.
